title: How to study science in 3 days of 10th class - Quora

response.answer_text: You can read and revise all your notes completely and do all the ncert questions and all the previous year questions of each and every chapter . do all the important and marked questions and diagram tought by your teacher in class .This is enough if you want to get 90+ in science board exam .

Make a list of all important topics from analysis of previous yr ques and divide one day for physics and one for chem nd one for biology . Practice all ncert examples and previous years question thoroughly Revise and practice sample paper also to analyse your mistakes and for time management . For bio must practice all diagram thoroughly For chem make a list of all imp reactions and revise them Phy revise all imp fig nd laws and send Hope it helps.
